title: Mexico City Grand Prix: Liam Lawson has near miss with F1 marshals
description: Liam Lawson says he narrowly avoided a fatal accident during Sunday's Mexico City Grand Prix after two marshals ran across the track.
content:
Formula 1 driver Liam Lawson said he narrowly avoided a fatal accident during Sunday's Mexico City Grand Prix after two marshals ran across the track in front of him.

title: Private rent in Britain now swallows 44% of the average wage
description: Monthly cost jumps to record £1,385 outside London, and £2,736 in the capital, with hotspots showing hefty rises
content:
Average private rents in Great Britain have climbed to record highs, with the amount tenants are being asked to pay in some hotspots rising more than 25% in a year, data shows.
The typical advertised private rent outside London for properties coming ... [3000 chars]

title: Home Office squandered billions on ‘failed and chaotic’ asylum accommodation
description: Commons committee describes successive governments’ failures to manage hotel use, contracts, spending and safeguarding
content:
The Home Office has squandered billions of pounds on asylum accommodation due to long-term mismanagement of a “failed, chaotic and expensive” system, according to a report published by a powerful parliamentary committee.

title: The striking Swedish workers taking on carmaker Tesla
description: The industrial action against the company's operation in Sweden has reached its second anniversary.
content:
In Sweden 70 car mechanics are continuing to take on one of the world's richest companies – Tesla. The strike at the US carmaker's 10 Swedish service centres has now reached its second anniversary, and there is little prospect of a resolution.
